profileDescription:
I am a System Engineer with diplomas in Python and DevNet, and a technologist in analysis and development of information system. I have 7 years of experience in software development, focusing on backend and frontend, artificial intelligence, implementing monolithic and microservices architectural patterns, distributed systems, and object-oriented programming. I Also have experience in modeling and managing databases, as well as designing UML diagrams. 

 I possess experience leading both team and individual projects using agile methodologies like Scrum and Kanban, as well as traditional ones, I have been involved in every stage and process, ensuring compliance, usability, scalability, and security. 

 My experience spans various sectors including banking and finance, payroll and electronic invoicing, social security, travel an tourism, marketing, legal services, public and private services, freelancing, consulting, and teaching programming classes to students.
